*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, Mexico, September 11, 1833. Report on prospects for Texas. Cholera in Mexico.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-11-1833">Sept. 11 1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I have nothing particular to say, more than what I informed you of by last mail. The cholera has abated, but there is not yet a *person_mentioned*majority of members*/person_mentioned* in this *location_mentioned*city */location_mentioned*so that there will be no meeting of *person_mentioned*Congress */person_mentioned*for a week or ten days yet.*/p*
*p*I think I shall succeed in getting the 11 article of*date_mentioned n="04-06-1830"> 6 april*/date_mentioned* law repealed—the establishment of weekly mails from *location_mentioned*Monclova */location_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*Sabine*/location_mentioned*, from *location_mentioned*Matamoras */location_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*Goliad */location_mentioned*and from *location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* to *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Liberty*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*The duties on Importations will be reduced and probably suspended, for a time in to to, tho the latter is not yet certain.*/p*
*p*The State question must take its course as prescribed in the constitution and be sent to the *location_mentioned*other States*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*The revolution is not over and God knows when it will be. I have great confidence in the *person_mentioned*vice president Gomez Farias*/person_mentioned*, If the *person_mentioned*heroes */person_mentioned*of the + [cross] get the upper hand it is difficult to say what they will do as to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*matters and it is very probable there will be a breaking up of the *person_mentioned*Govt*/person_mentioned*. But there is no prospect that they will succeed at present.*/p*
*p*In *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1833">October */date_mentioned*the time expires for locating *location_mentioned*grants*/location_mentioned*. See that *person_mentioned*Williams*/person_mentioned* attends to all that business and also to *person_mentioned*Padilla*/person_mentioned*s—dont neglect this. Also try and collect something on the notes due me. I shall spend about 2000 Dollars or probably 2,500 on this trip and as I am laboring for the common good no honest man will refuse to pay what he justly owes me.*/p*
*p*Were it not for you and *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*and the *person_mentioned*Old Settlers*/person_mentioned* I doubt whether I Should not remain here for a year or two—that is unless the revolution continues, for then no one will be safe here.*/p*
*p*I have recd, one letter from *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*since I left there, from *person_mentioned*John */person_mentioned*dated in *date_mentioned n="06-xx-1833">June*/date_mentioned*—I have written every mail since I arrived here, I hope the *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*are all well at *location_mentioned*Chocolate Bayou*/location_mentioned*. I have more confidence of health there than at *location_mentioned*peach point*/location_mentioned* I do not know whether *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*has returned—or not—he was to have left *location_mentioned*Mobile*/location_mentioned* about the middle of *date_mentioned n="07-15-1833">July */date_mentioned*as he wrote me from there. Tell *person_mentioned*John*/person_mentioned* to keep clear of *person_mentioned*land speculators*/person_mentioned*. I had rather herd with devils than with that class of mankind.*/p*
*p*I am unhappy that I do not hear from you—how are the *person_mentioned*children*/person_mentioned*— what kind of a crop—how is *person_mentioned*Stephen (my brothers boy)*/person_mentioned* and your *person_mentioned*neighbors */person_mentioned*and a thousand things,*/p*
*p*My health is good at this time*/p*
*p*farewell *person_mentioned* S. F. A*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*There were *person_mentioned*43000 sick*/person_mentioned* here at one time The deaths I believe have been about 18000. I have never witnessed such a horrible scene of distress and death. The *person_mentioned*common people*/person_mentioned* in a part of the state of *location_mentioned*Puebla */location_mentioned*got an idea that the water was poisoned by the *person_mentioned*foreigners*/person_mentioned* and they massacred seven *person_mentioned*frenchmen */person_mentioned*in one *location_mentioned*village*/location_mentioned*—all the *person_mentioned*foreigners */person_mentioned*in that place. Remember me to *person_mentioned*H Austin*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Phillips */person_mentioned*and his *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*and to your *person_mentioned*neighbors*/person_mentioned*—tell *person_mentioned*Henry */person_mentioned*that he must not neglect to locate his *location_mentioned*other League of land*/location_mentioned* before the time expires.*/p*
*p*I cannot tell when I shall get home I intend to persevere to the end and effect what I came for if I can regardless of time or expense.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F A*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
